creator: GRC World Forums
descriptionHtml:
Learn. Discover. Connect.

This is the official mobile app for GRC World Forums, the media and technology business behind PrivSec Global, FinCrime World Forums, Last Thursday In Privacy and Data Protection World Forum.

We provide business insight and educational resources to governance, risk and compliance professionals through our portfolio of digital forums, websites and professional communities.

The container app acts as a handy resource for all participants throughout the event lifecycle, allowing you access to the platform's capabilities from the ease of your mobile device.

It is particularly relevant for live updates, chats and networking, allowing you access to respond to messages at any time. Resources can be reviewed and shared, feedback provided and on demand content accessed. Agenda sessions can also be saved directly to your phone's calendar and reminders set in accordance.

The app contains all the events you have registered for under GRC World Forums, keeping you up-to-date on the latest content, speaker announcements, meeting and networking requests, along with notifications based on your preferences.



By using this app you will gain access to a wealth of interactive features including:

✓ Notifications: receive push notifications and alerts based on your agenda and networking preferences
✓ Dynamic Agenda: discover trending and live sessions, explore and filter sessions or speaker content
✓ Resources: access video, audio, websites, social feeds and downloadable content
✓ Speaker Lists: learn about speakers and what sessions they’re associated with
✓ Video Breakouts: benefit from interactive conversations with speakers and like-minded professionals
✓ Networking & interactive tools: connect with other participants, speakers and sponsors with similar interests. Have 121 private discussions through chat and organise meetings all through the app
✓ Activity challenges: earn points for interactivity and engagement during the various digital events
